SEARCH
Package ulb.infof307.g9.view

Class AlertBuilder

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g9.view.AlertBuilder
public class AlertBuilder extends Object
AlertBuilder is a helper class to build Alert popups of type INFO (by default), WARNING or ERROR It allows to add a header, content and stack trace to the popup and then display it with the show() method or get it with the build() method

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AlertBuilder()
    Create a new AlertBuilder with a default type INFORMATION

    • addHeader

      public AlertBuilder addHeader(String header)
      Add a header to the popup The header is displayed in bold at the top of the popup
      Parameters:
      header - short description of the popup like "An error occurred"
      Returns:
      the AlertBuilder

    • addContent

      public AlertBuilder addContent(String content)
      Add a content to the popup The content is displayed below the header
      Parameters:
      content - longer description of the popup
      Returns:
      the AlertBuilder

    • addStackTrace

      public AlertBuilder addStackTrace(String stackTrace)
      Add a stack trace to the popup The stack trace is displayed in a TextArea below the content and can be expanded by the user
      Parameters:
      stackTrace - the stack trace to display or any other info a developer might want to see
      Returns:
      the AlertBuilder

    • addStackTrace

      public AlertBuilder addStackTrace(Exception e)
      Helper method to add a stack trace to the popup using an Exception
      Parameters:
      e - the exception to display
      Returns:
      the AlertBuilder
